content: please meet levi this is a super easy little lovie requires ~ dk yarn i used a cotton mix yarn so that this lovie would wash easily a little polyester stuffing 4mm needles for the main part 3 5mm needles for the head toys are generally knitted on a size smaller than usual needle to make a more dense fabric which prevents the stuffing showing through one size but very easy to adjust great little gift idea **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
